ti:edition.ti:label: Oedipus at Colonus
ti:edition.ti:description: Sophocles, creator; Sophocles with an English translation Vol 1. Storr, Francis, 1839-1919, editor, translator. London, New York: William Heinemann Ltd., The Macmillan Company, 1912.

ti:translation.ti:label: Oedipus at Colonus
ti:translation.ti:description: Sophocles, creator; Sophocles the plays and fragments with critical notes, commentary, and translation in English prose Part 2 The Oedipus Coloneus. Jebb, Richard Claverhouse, Sir, 1841-1905, editor, translator. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press, 1889.
